Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.example.rucafe.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class Order extends Object implements Customizable
Order Class is a class that takes in a list of MenuItems with their respective data
Author:
Sumanth Rajkumar, Shantanu Jain
